title: Combinatorial invariants for certain classes of non-abelian groups
authors: Naveen K. Godara, Renu Joshi, and Eshita Mazumdar
abstract:
This article focuses on the study of zero-sum invariants of finite
non-abelian groups. We address two main problems: the first centers on the
ordered Davenport constant and the second on Gao's constant. We establish a
connection between the ordered Davenport constant and the small Davenport
constant for a finite non-abelian group of even order, which in turn gives a
relation with the Noether number. Additionally, we confirm a conjecture of Gao
and Li for a non-abelian group of order $2p^{\alpha}$, where $p$ is a prime.
Furthermore, we prove a conjecture that connects the ordered Davenport constant
to the Loewy length for certain classes of finite $2$-groups.
